ai-ja301:1.2_0: Let the town-dwellers entered the city, O Kings,
ai-ja301:2.3_0: “Those who are Liberating the spiritual life,
ai-ja301:3.3_0: When they said this, the king:
ai-ja301:4.2_0: The gods do not step by people;
ai-ja301:4.3_0: Tamed by joy is a person,
ai-ja301:4.4_0: At the time of the fires unconfused,
ai-ja301:4.6_0: it would be better for you to get better.”
ai-ja301:5.1_0: The first break are the first time.
